section.39: The Book on the Description of Hellfire

hadiths.text: Harithah bin Wahb Al-Khuzai narrated that the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) said:"Should I not inform you about the people of Paradise: They are every humble and weak person, who if he were to make an Oath by Allah, He would fulfill it. Should I not inform you about the people of the Fire: They are every prideful, swaggering, ill-speaking person
